sentences.sContent: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
sentences.sCn: 过了几个月他的案子才开审。

sentences.sContent: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
sentences.sCn: 这项任务总的时限为一周，必须按时完成。

trans.tranOther: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes
